sentences.en: ...the Asian, Caribbean and African members of the commonwealth.
sentences.cn: …英联邦在亚洲、加勒比海和非洲的成员国。

sentences.en: British subjects and Commonwealth citizens need not give their address.
sentences.cn: 英国臣民和共和国居民不用给出地址.

sentences.en: First to Kai over in the Commonwealth of Dominica.
sentences.cn: 首先是来自多米尼加联邦共和国的凯先生.

sentences.en: His Utopia is not a chimerical commonwealth but a practical improvement on what already exists.
sentences.cn: 他的乌托邦不是空想的联邦,而是对那些已经存在的联邦事实上的改进.

sentences.en: I competed in the Commonwealth Games in Christchurch, which was my swan song.
sentences.cn: 我参加了在克赖斯特彻奇举办的英联邦运动会，那是我的告别比赛。

sentences.en: I'm already too far from Commonwealth space for my charts to be accurate.
sentences.cn: 我们已经离联邦太远,图纸无法精确.

sentences.en: In 1935, President Roosevelt proclaimed the Philippine Islands a free commonwealth.
sentences.cn: 1935年的这一天, 罗斯福总统宣布菲律宾群岛独立成为联邦共和国.

sentences.en: In such a case, Commonwealth law demands that the AI's personality be completely erased.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 联邦法律要求这个智能机器人的性格特征被擦除.

sentences.en: Johnson set up a new Commonwealth Games in the 10000 meters.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊创英联邦运动会万米赛跑新纪录.

sentences.en: Law is an utterance determined by the common consent of the commonwealth.
sentences.cn: 法律是全体公民一致同意所决定的意见之表达.

sentences.en: The citadel of the Commonwealth and Empire could not be stormed.
sentences.cn: 联邦和帝国的堡垒是攻不破的.

sentences.en: The Peloponnesian war. terminated in the ruin of the Athenian commonwealth ( Alexander Hamilton )
sentences.cn: 伯罗奔尼撒战争以雅典同盟的毁灭而收尾 ( 亚历山大汉密尔顿 )

sentences.en: The Republic of Ghana achieved independence within the Commonwealth in March 1957.
sentences.cn: 加纳共和国于1957年3月在联邦内取得独立.

sentences.en: We led the commonwealth in practice as well as in theory.
sentences.cn: 我们不仅在理论上,而且在实际上领导着英联邦.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 独联体；独立国家联合体

trans.tran_en: used in the official names of some countries, groups of countries, or parts of countries
